StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruitCurrentLeadStatus]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @RecruitID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT sd.StatusID FROM [dbo].[RecruitCurrentLead] rcl INNER JOIN [dbo].[LeadStatusDisposi.on] lsd ON rcl.LeadID = lsd.LeadID INNER JOIN [dbo].[StatusDisposi.on] sd ON lsd.StatusDisposi.onID = sd.StatusDisposi.onID WHERE rcl.RecruitID = @RecruitID
